trans-unit.source: Forces the attributed object to be created in the context of the creator, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 強制盡可能建立的建立者，內容中的屬性化的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the context attributes of the attributed object conflict with those of the context of the creator, a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException?displayProperty=fullName> is thrown when an attempt is made to create the object.
trans-unit.target: 屬性化物件的內容屬性的內容建立者的衝突，則<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException?displayProperty=fullName>嘗試建立物件時，會擲回。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"></xref> class, requiring creation of the object in the context of the creator.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"></xref>類別，需要建立的建立者的內容中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"></xref> class, optionally not creating the object in the context of the creator.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.MustRunInClientContextAttribute"></xref>類別，您可以選擇不建立者的內容中建立物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create the object in the context of the creator; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>建立者; 的內容中建立物件否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the attributed object is to be created in the context of the creator.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否要建立者的內容中建立屬性化的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is to be created in the context of the creator; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件是在建立者; 的內容中建立否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
